snippet: Researchers from the New York Stem Cell Foundation Laboratory have, by lucky accident, found a way that stem cells can be harvested.
lead_paragraph: Researchers from the New York Stem Cell Foundation Laboratory have, by lucky accident, found a way that stem cells can be harvested.

headline.main: After Setbacks in Harvesting Stem Cells, a New Approach Shows Promise
headline.print_headline: After Setbacks in Harvesting Stem Cells, a New Approach Shows Promise
